A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana kwayar cutar a matsayin kwayar cuta ta farko da ake kira severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Bayan haka, cutar da ke haifarwa daga kamuwa da SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance da suna cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).

A cikin wannan bincike, muna ƙididdige ƙididdigar ƙididdiga na COVID-19 a cikin kowace ƙasa ta Ƙungiyar Turai / Ƙungiyar Kasuwancin Turai (EU/EEA) da Ƙasar Burtaniya (UK) da kuma suka kwatanta su da Ƙasar Hubei, China.
Kuma muka kwatanta adadin yawan cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya da adadin da ake da shi a Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu zuwa 15 ga watan Maris 2020.
Cutar Covid-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da kasar Birtaniya
Bayan kasar China, COVID-19 ya yi kama da yawa a fadin duniya kuma yanayin cutar ta COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen duniya na yanzu yana daidaita da wannan ƙasa.
A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya zama pandemiyar.

A cikin taron Eurosurveillance na 5 ga watan Maris na shekara ta 2020, Spiteri da sauransu sun bayyana a cikin taron na farko da aka tabbatar da COVID-19 a cikin Turai kamar yadda hukumar WHO ta bayyana.
A cikin EU/EEA, na farko biyu na tabbatarwa sun bayyana da Faransa a ranar 24 ga Janairu 2020 a cikin mutane da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga Maris 2020, COVID-19 ya shafi duk 30 kasashen EU/EEA da kasar Burtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin 31 Disamba 2019 da wannan ranar, an bayyana 39,768 kaso da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 kaso da 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.

A ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, tawarar mu ta buga shawarwar da ake buƙata a cikin tsari da aikin nuna cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), da wannan shawarwar ta bayyana nasarorin mu da kuma zama mai amfani ga ayyukan da suka shafi wannan cutar a duniya.

Duk da haka, cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ita ce cutar da ta dace, yadda muna samun shawarar da kuma iliminmu ya karu ta hanyar ayyukan karatun da ake yi da ayyukan aiki na yanzu; don haka, dabarun da ake amfani da su na nazarin da kuma ilimin da ake amfani da su suna karuwa.

A cikin Disamba 2019, cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) ta haifar da cutar, wacce a yanzu ana kiran ta a matsayin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kuma kwayar cutar ta kasance ana kiran ta severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Tarihin cututtukan Epidemiological: (1) tarihin tafiya ko rayuwa a birnin Wuhan da yanki masu kusa, ko kuma yankunan da aka bayyana cututtukan COVID-19 a cikin 14 days kafin farfado da alamun cutar; (2) tarihin tafiya da kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2 (tare da nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar nasarar

Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.

A ranar 30 ga Disamba, ƙungiyar ɗalibai a ƙaramar hukumar jirgin kasa ta Wuhan suka bayyana ga abokan aikinsu cewa "kwayar cutar SARS ta kai tsaye".
Na farko, an kama shida daga cikin doctarsu, ciki har da Li Wenliang, saboda yin labaran da ba a tabbatar da su ba, kuma mace ɗaya, Ai Fen, an kama ta saboda yin labarin.
Hukumar lafiya ta birnin Wuhan ta fitar da sanarwa ta jama'a a ranar 31 Disamba da ta bayyana ga Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.

Akwai rahotannin da ba a san su ba da yawa a cikin ciwon pneumonia a Wuhan wanda ya sa hukumomin lafiya suka fara bincike a farkon watan Janairu. A lokacin farkon cutar, adadin matsaloli ya yi kasa da kashi biyu a kowace rana kuma a kowace rana.

A farkon da karshe na Janairu 2020, cutar ta tashi zuwa yankuna daban-daban na kasar Sin, tare da taimakon tashin hankali na Shekara ta Sin da Wuhan a matsayin wurin tashin hankali kuma babban tashar jirgin kasa.
A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, kasar China ta bayyana cewa kimanin mutane 140 ne suka samu matsala a rana ɗaya, ciki har da mutane biyu a Beijing da ɗaya a Shenzhen.

Bayanin ofishin jama'a ya nuna cewa a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020, 6,174 mutane suna da alaƙa da alamun cutar. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, Amurka ta yi nasara a China da Italiya tare da mafi girman yawan cututtukan da aka tabbatar da su a duniya. A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu 2020, akwai fiye da 1.61 miliyan cututtuka da aka tabbatar da su a duniya; akwai fiye da 97,000 mutane da aka kashe da kuma fiye da 364,000 da suka samu nasara.
Kimanin 200 ƙasashe da ƙasashen hukuma sun sami matsala guda ɗaya.
Saboda cutar da ke cikin Turai, ƙasashe da yawa a cikin yankin Schengen sun kiyaye ayyukan da suka shafi ƙaura da kuma suka ƙirƙiri tsayayyun iyaka.

Ayyukan jama'a sun hada da hanyoyin sadarwa da suka hada da karantawa (wanda aka sani da hanyoyin zama a gida, hanyoyin ajiye baki, ko kuma lockdown) da kuma hanyoyin da ake tsarewa. A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, kimanin miliyan 300, ko kusan kashi 90% na yawan jama'a, suna cikin karantawa a Amurka, kimanin miliyan 50 suna cikin karantawa a Philippines, kimanin miliyan 59 suna cikin karantawa a Afirka ta Kudu, da kuma miliyan 1.3 suna cikin karantawa a Indiya.

Kasancewar farko da aka tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya fara ne a ranar 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan; wani rahoton da ba a tabbatar da shi ba ya nuna cewa aikin farko ya fara ne a ranar 17 Nuwamba.

Dokta Zhang Jixian ya bayyana cewa a ranar 26 ga watan Disamban, an gano ƙungiyar ƙwayoyin cuta masu cutar da alamun da ba a sani ba, inda hukumar kula da lafiya ta Wuhan Jianghan ta yi bayani a ranar 27 ga watan Disamban.
Gwajin genetik na farko na samfuran mutane a ranar 27 ga Disamba 2019 ya nuna cewa akwai cutar kwayar cutar SARS.
An fitar da sanarwa ta jama'a ta Hukumar Lafiya ta Gari na Wuhan a ranar 31 ga Disamba.
An yi bayani ga WHO a ranar nan.
A lokacin da wannan bayanin ya faru, likitocin Wuhan suka bayyana ga 'yan sanda a matsayin wanda ke tattara labarai game da cutar.
Kungiyar Lafiya ta Ƙasa ta kasar Sin ta bayyana cewa ba a samu "babban bayani" game da yaduwar cutar a tsakanin mutane.

A watan Janairu na ƙarshe, gwamnatin kasar China ta fara yakin da aka yi bayyana a matsayin "yakin jama'a" da shugaban jam'iyyar kwaminisanci ta kasar China Xi Jinping ya yi bayyana a matsayin yakin da za a yi don tabbatar da cewa cutar ta COVID-19 za ta iya tsallakewa.

A cikin wani lokacin da aka bayyana a matsayin "cikakken karantawa mafi girma a tarihin dan Adam", an sanar da cikakken karantawa a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu don tabbatar da cewa ba za a yi amfani da hanyoyin da ke zuwa da daga cikin Wuhan, wanda aka sauya zuwa cikakken kusan 15 birane a Hubei, wanda ya shafi kimanin miliyan 57 na mutane.
Amfani da motocin ɗabiɓar mutum an hana a birnin.
Bikin Shekarar Sinanci (25 ga Janairu) an cire shi daga yankunan da dama.

Majalisar Gwamnati ta bayyana ranar rantsuwa don fara da rana na mintuna uku na siyasa a ranar 10:00 4 ga Afrilu, ya dogara da Qingming Festival, amma gwamnatin kasa ta yi kira ga iyalai su yi aiki online a matsayin aiki don karewa a matsayin don hana sabon COVID-19.
An tabbatar da cewa cutar Covid-19 ta shiga Koriya ta Kudu a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020 daga China.

Hukumar lafiya ta kasar ta bayyana ci gaba mai yawa a cikin ayyukan tabbatarwa a ranar 20 ga watan Fabrairu, wanda aka yi la'akari da shi a cikin taron a Daegu na ƙungiyar addini ta Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
Shincheonji devotayin da suka ziyarci Daegu daga Wuhan an sanar da su a matsayin asalin cutar.
A ranar 22 ga watan Fabrairu, cikin 9,336 masu kula da cocin, 1,261 ko kusan 13% sun bayyana matsalun lafiya.Kasar Koriya ta tabbatar da matsin lamba mafi girma a ranar 23 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.
A ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu, sama da mutane 2,000 an tabbatar da cewa suna da cutar a kasar Koriya, amma a ranar 29 ga watan Fabrairu, sun kai 3,150.
Kowace rundunar sojojin Koriya ta yi karantawa bayan gwajin da ya tabbatar da cewa sojojin uku suna da kwayar cutar.

Iran ya ba da rabi 5 na rial don yaki da cutar.
Shugaban Hassan Rouhani ya ce a ranar 26 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 cewa ba a cikin shawarwarin da suka shafi yankunan da ke cikin cutar, kuma kawai mutane ne za su kashe.
An bayyana a watan Maris shawarwarin kafa iyakance hanyoyi tsakanin biranen, amma ababen hawa tsakanin biranen kafin Nowruz, shekarar farko ta Farsi, ya ci gaba.
Shia shrines a Qom suka kasance masu buƙatar mahajjata har zuwa 16 ga watan Maris 2020. Iran ta zama babban wurin haɗaɗɗin cutar a cikin watan Fabrairu bayan China.

A cikin bayanin cewa akwai kawar da bayyana yawan cutar a Iran, akalla kasashe 10 suka tabbatar da cewa aikinsu ya samo asali ne daga Iran a ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu, wanda ya nuna cewa yawan cutar zai kasance mai girma fiye da 388 da gwamnatin Iran ta bayyana a wannan ranar.
Majalisar Iran ta yi nasara, tare da tabbatar da cewa 23 daga cikin membobinta 290 na dauke da kwayar cutar a ranar 3 ga Maris.

A ranar 12 ga watan Maris, Human Rights Watch ya bukaci hukumomin gidan yari na kasar Iran da su saki daidai da kuma saki a lokaci na tsawon lokaci daga gidan yari kowane mutum da ke da alhakin haƙƙin ɗan adam wanda aka tsare a matsayin mutane da suka yi aiki a matsayin masu haƙƙin ɗan adam.
Ya bayyana cewa akwai damuwa cewa cutar zai iya yaduwa a cikin wuraren da ke cikin tsari kamar wuraren tsarewa, wanda kuma ba a samun lafiya mai inganci ba.
A ranar 15 ga watan Maris, gwamnatin Iran ta bayyana mutuwar 100 a ranar ɗaya, mafi girman da aka yi rajista a kasar daga lokacin da yakin ya fara.
Aƙalla 12 siyasa da ƙungiyoyin gwamnati na Iran da ke zaune ko kuma masu aiki sun mutu daga cutar ta 17 ga Maris.
A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, kasar Iran ta yi nasarar tabbatar da cewa kowace sa'o'i 50 na mutanen da suka shiga cikin kwayar cutar ta Coronavirus, kuma kowace mintuna 10 na mutuwa.
Kamar yadda shugaban WHO ya bayyana, zai iya zama akwai matsala guda biyar a cikin Iran fiye da da aka bayyana.
Kuma ana nuna cewa takunkumin da Amurka ta sanya kan Iran zai iya tasiri ga tsarin kudi na kasar don yin jawabi ga cutar.

A ranar 19 ga watan Maris, Italiya ta zarce kasar China a matsayin kasar da ke da mafi yawan mutanen da suka mutu sakamakon cutar coronavirus a duniya bayan tabbatar da mutuwar 3,405 daga cutar.
A ranar 22 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa Russia ta ƙirƙiri tara jiragen soji da kayayyakin lafiya zuwa Italiya.
A ranar 5 ga watan Afrilu, akwai 128,948 rikodin, 15,887 mutuwa, da kuma 21,815 cikakken samun nasarar a Italiya, tare da kashi mafi girma na wannan rikodin a yankin Lombardy.
Rahoton CNN ya nuna cewa yawan jama'a masu shekaru da dama a Italiya da kuma cewa ba a gudanar da gwajin kwayar cutar a duk wanda ya dauki kwayar a yanzu ba ne suka haifar da kashi da yawa na mutuwa.

A ranar 20 ga watan Maris, gwamnati ta sanar da cewa duk wuraren shakatawa kamar pub da gyms za su yi kama da yadda ake buƙatar, kuma ta bayyana cewa za ta biya kashi 80% na kuɗin aikin ɗalibai har zuwa £2,500 a kowace wata don hana aikatawa a cikin matsakaicin lokacin.
Ba kamar ayyukan da suka gabata ba, wadannan tsare-tsare suna iya aiki ne ta hanyar yan sanda ta shirya kudaden shiga da kuma tafiyar zanga-zangar.

A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, an tabbatar da cewa cutar ta COVID-19 ta fara zama sanadiya a cikin Pacific Northwest na jihar Washington a cikin ɗan ƙasar da ya dawo daga Wuhan a ranar 15 ga watan Janairu.
An ƙaddamar da ƙungiyar aikin ƙungiyar COVID-19 ta White House a ranar 29 ga watan Janairu.
A ranar 31 ga watan Janairu, gwamnatin Trump ta tabbatar da matsalar lafiya ta jama'a, kuma ta kiyaye hanyar shiga ga masu shiga daga kasar China.
A ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020 ne, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Amurka ta bayyana cewa ta samar da kitin da za a yi amfani da shi wajen samun rahoton cutar.
Bayan haka, Amurka ta fara aikin gwajin da ya yi, wanda ya kama yiwuwar yadda yake aiki a lokacin.

A ranar 27 ga watan Fabrairu, The Washington Post ta bayyana cewa an yi gwajin kasa da 4,000 a Amurka.
A ranar 13 ga watan Maris, The Atlantic ta bayyana cewa akwai kusan 14,000 gwajin da aka yi.

A ranar 22 ga Maris, Associated Press ta bayyana: "Kadai masu alamun da takardar laifin lauya sun yi waƙa ko rana don aikin test."Bayan an sanar da mutuwar farko a Amurka a jihar Washington a ranar 29 ga Fabrairu, Gwamna Jay Inslee ya shigar da matsalar kasa, wanda ya yi nasara a cikin sauran jihar.

Makarantu a yankin Seattle sun dakatar da koyarwa a ranar 3 ga Maris, kuma a karshe makarantu a kasar suna kare a tsakanin Maris. A ranar 6 ga Maris 2020, Amurka ta amince da bayanai kan tasirin korona na baya akan kasar ta cewa daga cikin masana kimiyya a Jami'ar Imperial London.

A ranar da shugaban Trump ya sanya Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, wanda ya ba da $8.3 biliyan a cikin tallafi na shari'a don hukumomin tarayya su yi watsi da cutar.
Masu alhakin kamfanoni suka kiyaye tsarin tafiya ga ma’aikatan su, suka dakatar da tarurruka, kuma suka ba da shawarar ma’aikatan su suyi aiki daga gida.

Wasannin kwallon kafa da kuma lokutan wasanni an dakatar da su. A ranar 11 ga Maris, Trump ya bayyana kananan hanyoyin tafiye-tafiye zuwa yammacin Turai, ciki har da Birtaniya, don rana 30, da farko a ranar 13 ga Maris.
A ranar da ta biyo bayan, ya karfafa tsarin da ya haɗa ƙasashen Ingila da Ireland.
A ranar 13 ga Maris, ya bayyana matsalar ƙasa, wanda ya sa kuɗi na ƙasa zai kasance a cikin ƙarfin kuɗi don amsa matsalar.
A ranar 15 ga watan Maris, akasarin kamfanoni suka yi kama ko kuma suka hana sauran sa'o'i a cikin Amurka don kawo karshen yin watsi da cutar.

A ranar 17 ga watan Maris, cutar ta tabbatar da cewa a cikin kowace ƙasa 50 da cibiyar tarayya ta Amurka. A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa birnin New York yana da 10,700 kaso na cutar coronavirus, da yawa da jimillar kaso a kasar Koriya ta Kudu.
A ranar 25 ga watan Maris, gwamnan ya ce cewa rikicin jama'a ya fara aiki, saboda ayyukan da suka danganci COVID-19 suka yi ƙaranci daga 2.0 rana zuwa 4.7 rana.

A ranar 28 ga watan Maris, akwai 32,308 a cikin New York City, da kuma mutane 672 sun mutu ne daga cutar. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, Amurka an bayyana cewa yana da yawan cutar coronavirus da aka tabbatar da cewa kowane ƙasa a duniya, ciki har da Sin da Italiya. A ranar 8 ga watan Afrilu, 400,335 an tabbatar da cewa a Amurka, da kuma mutane 12,841 sun mutu.
A ranar 30 ga watan Maris, bayan sanarwar labaran kimiyya, Shugaban Amurka Trump ya yanke shawarar tsawaita tsarin jirgin kasa har zuwa 30 ga watan Afrilu.
A ranar nan, USNS Comfort, motar asibiti da ke da kusan 1000 kaya, ta yi kama a New York.
A ranar 3 ga Afrilu, Amurka ta samu kwanaki 884 na mutuwa a cikin 24 na sa'o'i saboda cutar coronavirus.

A cikin jihar New York, a ranar 3 ga Afrilu, yawan cutarun da aka samu sun kai 100,000. Gwamnatin Amurka ta kasance cikin tsanani saboda aikin da ta yi wajen kawar da matsalar da kuma kawar da bayyanar da bayanai ta hanyar amincewa da shugaban gudanarwa Mike Pence.
Ganin shugabancin Trump a kan matsalar ta kasance a cikin yanayin da ba za a iya kiyaye shi ba.
Ƙananan hukumomin Amurka da masu magana sun yi kuskure kan Amurka da ta yi amfani da shigo da kayayyaki masu mahimmanci daga China, ciki har da kayayyakin lafiya masu mahimmanci.

A ranar Laraba, Hukumar wasan Kwalon Kondo (NBA) ta Amurka ta dakatar da kakar bana ta kwallon hannu sanadiyar al’amura da suka danganci COVID-19.
Dubai, Sydney, da Melbourne kuma an bayyana su a matsayin wuraren da aka fi shirya masu zuwa daga Wuhan.

Bali ya kasance a matsayin mafi karancin damar cikin 20 birane masu yawan zirga-zirga a cikin damar shirya, yayin da birane a Ostiraliya suka kasance mafi karancin damar. Ostiraliya ta fitar da Shirin Yanke Garkuwa da Cutar Coronavirus (COVID-19) a ranar 7 ga watan Fabrairu.
Ita ta ce akwai abubuwa da yawa da za a iya samuwa game da COVID-19, da kuma cewa Australia za ta nemi daidaita iyakokin kasa da kuma sadarwa a cikin jawabinta ga cutar.
A ranar 21 ga Maris, an tabbatar da al'amuran lafiyar dan adam a Australia.

A cikin hukumar da aka yi nasarar kare hanyoyin sadarwar jama'a a Wuhan da Hubei, akwai manyan ƙasashe da suka shirya ƙaura ƙasashen su da ƙungiyoyin ƙasashen waje daga yankin, galibi ta hanyar jiragen da aka ajiye na ƙasashen su, tare da hukumomin kasar China suka ba da izini.
Canada, Amurka, Japan, Indiya, Sri Lanka, Australia, Faransa, Argentina, Jamus, da Thailand suna cikin sauran na farko da suka ƙaddamar da shirye-shirye don ƙaura daga ƙasashensu.
Pakistan ya ce ba zai kwashe kowa daga China ba.
A ranar 7 ga watan Fabrairu, Brazil ta kwashe mutane 34 na kasar Brazil ko dangin su tare da mutane hudu na Poland, mutum ɗaya na China da kuma mutum ɗaya na Indiya.
Mazauna kasar Poland, China, da India suka shiga Poland, inda jirgin Brazil ya yi tafiya kafin ya ci gaba da hanyarsa zuwa Brazil.
Babban Taron Ƙasa na Brazil ya yi shekaru goma ya na muhawarar yin dokar, kuma irin wannan aure an halasta shi ne kawai a jihar Rio Grande.
A wannan ranar, 215 Kanadanci (176 daga jirgin farko, da kuma 39 daga jirgin biyu da gwamnatin Amurka ta shirya) suka fito daga Wuhan zuwa CFB Trenton don ajiye su a cikin karfe biyu.
A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, jirgin da ya kai mutane 185 daga Wuhan na kasar Kanada ya tashi a CFB Trenton.

Hukumomin Australiya suka saki mutane 277 a ranar 3 da 4 ga Fabrairu zuwa babban wajen tsare mutane na Christmas Island, wanda aka sake amfani da shi a matsayin wajen karantawa, inda suka zama na 14 rana.

Jirgin New Zealand da aka yi shirya ya tashi ya kai ga Auckland a ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu; mutanen da suka shiga jirgin (wanda suka hada da mutanen daga Australia da cikin Pacific) suna cikin karantawa a cikin tashar jiragen ruwa a Whangaparoa, kudu da Auckland.
A ranar 15 ga watan Fabrairu, Amurka ta bayyana cewa za ta tare da Amurkawa da ke cikin motar kaya Diamond Princess.
A ranar 21 ga Fabrairu, jirgin da ke dauke da mutane 129 na Kanada da aka kwashe daga Diamond Princess ya kai Trenton, Ontario.

A farkon Maris, gwamnatin ƙasar Indiya ta fara ƙaura daga Iran. A ranar 14 ga Maris, jirgin sama na South African Airways wanda gwamnatin ƙasar South Africa ta shirya ya ƙaura 112 mutane na ƙasar South Africa.
An gudanar da gwajin lafiya kafin shiga, kuma akalla mutane hudu na Afirka ta Kudu da ke nuna alamun cutar coronavirus an tsare su a wajen kawar da matsala.
Kawai mutanen Afirka ta Kudu da suka tabbatar da cewa ba su da kwayar cutar ba ne suka dawo.

Bayyanar da sakamakon gwajin kwayar cutar ta tabbatar da cewa duk mutanen Afirka ta Kudu, ciki har da jirgin sama, jirgin sama, gungun hotel, jami'an tsaro da sojojin da suka shiga aikin kare rayuwa da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi watsi da hukumar da suka yi wats
A ranar 20 ga watan Maris, Amurka ta fara dakatar da sojojin ta daga kasar Iraq sakamakon cutar.
A ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu, ofishin gwamnatin kasar Sin ya bayyana cewa kasashen 21 (ciki har da Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad da Tobago, Masar, da Iran) suka ba da taimako ga Sin.

A ranar 5 ga Fabrairu, Bill da Melinda Gates sun bayar da kudaden $100,000,000 zuwa WHO don tallafawa ayyukan bincike kan maganin cutar da kuma ayyukan ilimin maganin cutar da kuma kare "al'ummomin da ke cikin hatsari a Afirka da Asiya ta Kudu".

Interaksyon ya bayyana cewa gwamnatin Sin ta ba da 200,000 masu kama cuta zuwa kasar Filipinawa a ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu, bayan cewa Sanata Richard Gordon ya ba da 3.16 miliyan masu kama cuta zuwa Wuhan.
A ranar 19 ga watan Fabrairu, Red Cross na Singapore ya bayyana cewa zai ba da kudi $2.26 miliyan da ajiya zuwa China.

Japan ta ba da wani miliyan face masks zuwa Wuhan, Turkiyya ta harba kayayyakin lafiya, Rasha ta harba kimanin 13 ton na kayayyakin lafiya zuwa Wuhan, Malaysia ta bayyana tabbacin da ta ba da miliyan 18 na kai da kai zuwa China, Jamus ya harba kayayyakin lafiya da dama ciki har da 10,000 Hazmat suits, da kuma Amurka ta ba da kimanin 17.8 ton na kayayyakin lafiya zuwa China da kuma wadanda suka yi watsi da $100 miliyan a cikin tallace-tallace zuwa kasashen da suka shafi bayyana.
A watan Maris, kasar China, Cuba da Rasha suka taimaka wa Italiya ta samar da kayayyakin lafiya da masu kula da lafiya domin taimakawa wajen magance cutar coronavirus.
Mai kasuwanci Jack Ma ya tuntuɓi 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, da 60,000 protective suits zuwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia don tafiyar da shi ta Majalisar Afirka.
Bayan haka, ya tafi 5,000 takardun testin, 100,000 masu kama mata da 5 ventilators zuwa Panama.
Ma kuma ya bayar da kayayyakin lafiya zuwa Kanada. Nijeriya, Spain, Turkiyya, Georgia, da Jamhuriyar Czech sun bayyana goyon bayansu game da masu fashe na kasar Sin da kitse masu kira.

A matsayin misali, Spain ya dakatar da 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits tare da adadin daidaituwa na kashi 30%, a cikin wannan lokacin, Netherlands ya dakatar da 600,000 Chinese face masks wanda ya kasance daidaituwa.
Belgium ya ɗauki 100,000 masu ɗaukar kai da ba su dace ba, wanda aka yi imanin cewa daga kasar Sin ne, amma a cikin Colombia ne.

Duk da haka, tallafin kasar Sin ya samu nasarar yin amfani da shi a yankunan Amurka ta Kudu da Afirka. A ranar 2 ga Afrilu, Bankin Duniya ya fara aikace-aikacen tallafin gaggawa don kasashen keɓantawa.
WHO ya tabbatar da ayyukan hukumomin kasar Sin a cikin gudanar da da kare annoba.

Kungiyar Kwallon Kafa ta Duniya ta bayyana bambanta tsakanin cutar SARS ta shekarar 2002-2004, inda hukumomin kasar Sin suka kasance a cikin sirri wanda ya hana hanyoyin karewa da karewa, da matsalolin yanzu inda gwamnatin kasa "ta bayyana bayyanuwa na tsawon lokaci don hana paniki a cikin bayyane kafin ranar Sabuwar Shekara".

A ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, a cikin yanayin da hukumomin tsakiya suka yanke shawarar aiwatar da haramin aikin jirgin kasa a Wuhan, mai wakiltar WHO Gauden Galea ya bayyana cewa ba za a iya amincewa da shawarar da WHO ta yi ba, amma kuma "mai mahimmanci ne a matsayin bayani na ci gaba da kare cutar a wurin da take yawan samuwa" da ya kira shi "mai mahimmanci ne a tarihin lafiyar jama'a".A ranar 30 ga watan Janairu, bayan tabbatar da samun ci gaba a cikin yanayin juyawa daga ɗan adam zuwa ɗan adam da karuwar yawan cutar a ƙasashe masu zuwa, WHO ta bayyana cewa cutar zai zama cutar lafiya ta ƙasa ta duniya (PHEIC), PHEIC na farko da aka yi amfani da shi bayan da aka yi amfani da shi a cikin 2009 swine flu pandemic.

Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.

Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.

A ranar 28 ga Maris 2020, FDA ta ba da izini na amfani da hydroxychloroquine da chloroquine a hannun doctars da suke shirya masu cutar COVID-19. Chinese 7th edition guidelines kuma suka hada interferon, ribavirin ko umifenovir don amfani da su da cutar COVID-19.
Bayanan farko sun nuna cewa ribavirin mai girma dole ne ya hana SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.

Nitazoxanide ya kasance ana ɗaukarsa don aikin bincike a cikin rayuwa bayan tabbatar da cewa yana iya kawar da kashi ɗaya na kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2. Binciken ya nuna cewa kawar da farko na kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta hanyar haɗin gwiwa da ACE2 ta hanyar transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) shine mafi girma.
